verses.verse: ( The LORD Reigns!) ( 230 99:1-9 ) יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD מָלָךְ֮ <WH4427> mā·lāḵ reigns! גֵּא֪וּת <WH1348> gê·’ūṯ in majesty; לָ֫בֵ֥שׁ <WH3847> lā·ḇêš He is robed לָבֵ֣שׁ <WH3847> lā·ḇêš has clothed יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD עֹ֣ז <WH5797> ‘ōz with strength. הִתְאַזָּ֑ר <WH247> hiṯ·’az·zār and armed Himself אַף־ <WH637> ’ap̄- indeed תִּכּ֥וֹן <WH3559> tik·kō·wn is firmly established; תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל <WH8398> tê·ḇêl The world בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- it cannot תִּמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> tim·mō·wṭ be moved.

נָכ֣וֹן <WH3559> nā·ḵō·wn [was] established כִּסְאֲךָ֣ <WH3678> kis·’ă·ḵā Your throne מֵאָ֑ז <WH227> mê·’āz long ago; מֵֽעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> mê·‘ō·w·lām [are] from all eternity. אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> ’āt·tāh You

נָשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> nā·śə·’ū have risen, נְהָר֨וֹת׀ <WH5104> nə·hā·rō·wṯ The floodwaters יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD; נָשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> nā·śə·’ū have raised נְהָר֣וֹת <WH5104> nə·hā·rō·wṯ the rivers קוֹלָ֑ם <WH6963> qō·w·lām their voice; יִשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> yiś·’ū lift up נְהָר֣וֹת <WH5104> nə·hā·rō·wṯ the seas דָּכְיָֽם׃ <WH1796> dā·ḵə·yām their pounding waves.

מִקֹּל֨וֹת׀ <WH6963> miq·qō·lō·wṯ Above the roar מַ֤יִם <WH4325> ma·yim waters — רַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> rab·bîm of many אַדִּירִ֣ים <WH117> ’ad·dî·rîm the mighty מִשְׁבְּרֵי־ <WH4867> miš·bə·rê- breakers יָ֑ם <WH3220> yām of the sea — אַדִּ֖יר <WH117> ’ad·dîr is majestic. בַּמָּר֣וֹם <WH4791> bam·mā·rō·wm on high יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD

עֵֽדֹתֶ֨יךָ׀ <WH5713> ‘ê·ḏō·ṯe·ḵā Your testimonies נֶאֶמְנ֬וּ <WH539> ne·’em·nū confirmed; מְאֹ֗ד <WH3966> mə·’ōḏ are fully לְבֵיתְךָ֥ <WH1004> lə·ḇê·ṯə·ḵā Your house, נַאֲוָה־ <WH4998> na·’ă·wāh- adorns קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš holiness יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, לְאֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> lə·’ō·reḵ for all the days יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> yā·mîm to come.
